snippet: The N.C.A.A. upheld its nine-game suspension of Boeheim, Syracuse’s coach, but he will be allowed to begin serving it immediately.
abstract: NCAA upholds nine-game suspension of Syracuse coach Jim Boeheim but allows him to begin serving it immediately--meaning he will miss only three Atlantic Coast Conference games; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. upheld its nine-game suspension of Boeheim, Syracuse’s coach, but he will be allowed to begin serving it immediately.
